title: Chandralekha (1948 film)
summary: Chandralekha (also spelt Chandraleka)[lower-alpha 2] is a 1948 Indian historical adventure film produced and directed by S. S. Vasan of  Gemini Studios. Starring T. R. Rajakumari, M. K. Radha and Ranjan, the film follows two brothers (Veerasimhan and Sasankan) who fight over ruling their father's kingdom and marrying the village dancer, Chandralekha.
